content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: DisableSiteEdgeEngine2 path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/delivery/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/scripting content: params

desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum disable serverless scripting
